articles.description: Gold on the MCX was down nearly by Rs 445, and with the Indian currency stable, it would not be a surprise to see gold rates dip by almost Rs 400 per 10 grams. Gold for Feb delivery was trading lower by Rs 445 at Rs 48,860 per 10 grams. Internationally too, t…
articles.content:
Gold prices in India are likely to open lower, when shops and establishments selling gold, open-up for operations.
